You own the world's most versatile, customizable camera: your iPhone. Out of the box, your iPhone camera is no-frills, but you can transform it into a digital darkroom, photo editing suite, and photoblogging tool all rolled into one . . . if you know how to use it.

 Create Great iPhone Photos shows you how to take great iPhone photographsÃ¢â‚¬â€and even turn your not-so-hot photos into thrillingly inventive, atmospheric images. Author and iPhone photographer Allan Hoffman shows you how to harness the full potential of your iPhone's camera and turn it into a wildly fun tool for photographic creativity. You'll learn tips and tricks for generating effects, applying filters, and manipulating your images with wonderfully innovative appsÃ¢â‚¬â€all right on your iPhone. And you'll be inspired by interviews with today's top iPhone photographers and galleries of their impressive work.
